channel.title: Sprite's problem
channel.description: Hey guys so I'm trying to change the background and get rid of some annoying login interfaces for this server I'm trying to code and whenever I change/delete a sprite when I start all my stuff up again it wont change?? Possible problems: My cache is downloaded and I can login but the cache folder itself is not in the client or source folders. Maybe should I put the cache in one of those? And if so where. Thanks.

item.title: Sprite's problem
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Your cache is probably packed and you will need to uses toms suite to replace

Read full topic
